forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning will give way to cloudy skies and light rain during the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 54F. S winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
